revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Classic attack}} '''A_SerpentMeleeAttack'''
(''no parameter'')
Performs a melee attack dealing 5-40 points of damage and plays the sound "SerpentMeleeHit" on the Body channel. The function also has a 37.5% chance of calling [[A_SerpentCheckForAttack]]. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Serpent}} and derived classes.
